Description: This rule detects sign-ins that have been flagged as risky by Entra ID Protection.
Name: 3ecb22ed-fe50-4006-ac55-11b2c5562b33
Query:
let IPManagedAttempts = SigninLogs
| union AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where (tostring( parse_json(DeviceDetail_dynamic).trustType) != "" or tostring( parse_json(DeviceDetail_string).trustType) != "") or (DeviceDetail_dynamic or DeviceDetail_string contains "PII Removed")
| distinct IPAddress;
let IncidentCreated =SecurityIncident
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where Owner contains "@wizardcyber.com" and Owner !contains "soc@wizardcyber.com"
| mv-expand AlertIds
| extend AlertID = tostring(AlertIds)
| distinct AlertID;
let AuthenticationAttemptFromNewCountryAlert = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where AlertName contains "Authentication Attempt from New Country"
| extend parsed = parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand parsed
| where parsed.Type == "ip"
| extend NewCountryIPAddress = tostring(parsed.Address)
| distinct NewCountryIPAddress,SystemAlertId
| join kind=inner IncidentCreated on $left.SystemAlertId == $right.AlertID;
let AnomalousSigninAlert = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where AlertName contains "Anomalous Sign-in Detected"
| extend parsed = parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand parsed
| where parsed.Type == "ip"
| extend AnomalousSigninIPAddress = tostring(parsed.Address)
| distinct AnomalousSigninIPAddress,SystemAlertId
| join kind=inner IncidentCreated on $left.SystemAlertId == $right.AlertID;
let ImpossibleTravelAlert =SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where AlertName contains "Impossible travel"
| extend parsed = parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand parsed
| where parsed.Type == "ip"
| extend ImpossibleTravelIPAddress = tostring(parsed.Address)
| distinct ImpossibleTravelIPAddress,SystemAlertId
| join kind=inner IncidentCreated on $left.SystemAlertId == $right.AlertID;
let IdentityProtectionAlerts = SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where ProviderName == "IPC"
| extend parsed = parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand parsed
| where parsed.Type == "ip"
| extend IPCIPAddress = tostring(parsed.Address)
| distinct IPCIPAddress,SystemAlertId
| join kind=inner IncidentCreated on $left.SystemAlertId == $right.AlertID;
let RiskyUsers = AADUserRiskEvents
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| summarize min(TimeGenerated),make_set(RiskEventType),make_set(RiskLevel),make_set(RiskState),make_set(RiskDetail),make_set(AdditionalInfo)  by  Type = "UserRiskEvents",UserPrincipalName,IpAddress,tostring(Location)
| project-reorder min_TimeGenerated,UserPrincipalName,IpAddress,Location,set_AdditionalInfo,set_RiskEventType,set_RiskLevel,set_RiskDetail,set_RiskState
| join kind=leftanti IPManagedAttempts on $left.IpAddress == $right.IPAddress
| join kind=leftanti AuthenticationAttemptFromNewCountryAlert on $left.IpAddress == $right.NewCountryIPAddress
| join kind=leftanti AnomalousSigninAlert on $left.IpAddress == $right.AnomalousSigninIPAddress
| join kind=leftanti ImpossibleTravelAlert on $left.IpAddress == $right.ImpossibleTravelIPAddress
| join kind=leftanti IdentityProtectionAlerts on $left.IpAddress == $right.IPCIPAddress
| extend IPAddress = IpAddress
| extend LocationDetails = Location
| project-away IpAddress,Location;
let RiskySignins =SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where RiskEventTypes != "[]" or RiskEventTypes != "[]"
| summarize min(TimeGenerated),make_set(ResultType),make_set(ResultDescription),make_set(Status),make_set(RiskEventTypes),make_set(RiskEventTypes_V2)  by  Type = "Signinlogs",UserPrincipalName,IPAddress,tostring(LocationDetails),tostring(DeviceDetail)
| join kind=leftanti IPManagedAttempts on $left.IPAddress == $right.IPAddress
| join kind=leftanti AuthenticationAttemptFromNewCountryAlert on $left.IPAddress == $right.NewCountryIPAddress
| join kind=leftanti AnomalousSigninAlert on $left.IPAddress == $right.AnomalousSigninIPAddress
| join kind=leftanti ImpossibleTravelAlert on $left.IPAddress == $right.ImpossibleTravelIPAddress
| join kind=leftanti IdentityProtectionAlerts on $left.IPAddress == $right.IPCIPAddress;
let RiskTable = union isfuzzy=true RiskySignins,RiskyUsers;
RiskTable
